gate_name: The Family / The Gate of Friendship

37.1.hd_quote: Harmony is the key to the successful maintenance of relationships.
37.1.behavioral_axis: Establishes emotional harmony so tribal rules can exist.

37.2.hd_quote: The understanding of the principle of individual responsibility as the foundation for successful cooperation.
37.2.behavioral_axis: Keeps the bargain clear: everyone contributes to the tribe.
37.2.shadow_axis: Points out others’ duty but forgets their own.

37.3.hd_quote: The ability to judge what behaviour is appropriate and to react in a balanced manner to transgressions.
37.3.behavioral_axis: Applies the rules evenly to preserve family harmony.
37.3.shadow_axis: Tests boundaries or reacts too harshly to tests.

37.4.hd_quote: The manifestation of the highest principles in everyday and practical affairs.
37.4.behavioral_axis: Leads the family by living the tribal values.

37.5.hd_quote: Natural harmony and sharing possible through friendship.
37.5.behavioral_axis: Radiates friendliness that invites outsiders into the bargain.

37.6.hd_quote: A need for diversity that may ignore the achievements of the family in favour of withdrawal.
37.6.behavioral_axis: Seeks broader purpose and may step out to refresh tribal values.
37.6.shadow_axis: Detaches so far it seems disloyal.
